text: Sipas ʙa dunʙoli onon pajomʙaroni digaramonro [maʙ'us kardem] va sipas Iso pisari Marjamro firistodem va Incilro ʙa u ato namudem va dar dili pajravonas ra'fat va mehruʙoni nihodem, vale [dunjogurezi va] rahʙonijatero, ki ʙid'at nihodand, Mo ʙar onon muqarrar nadostem va harcand hadafason calʙi xusnudii ilohi ʙud, vale haqqi onro [cunonki ʙojad] riojat nakardand. Az in ru, Mo ʙa afrode az eson, ki imon ovardand, podosasonro ato kardem, vale ʙisjore az onon [ʙa ʙeroha raftand va] nofarmon ʙudand
